carousel.title: {data, select, 1 {K-Beauty 360: The Complete Evolution of the Korean Beauty Routine} 2{TechStyle: The Cutting-Edge Fusion of Fashion and Technology in Korea} 3{Gastronomy Gangnam: The Trendsetting Culinary Scene in Seoul} 4{Hallyu Wave 2.0: The New Era of Global Korean Entertainment} 5{Slow Life Hanok: Rediscovering Tranquility Through Traditional Korean Living} 6{Sustainable Seoul: Korea's Drive Towards an Eco-Conscious Future} other{lorem ipsum}}
carousel.subtitle: {data, select, 1 {Discover the Latest Trends in Skincare and Makeup that are Revolutionizing the Beauty Industry} 2{Explore the Intersection of Innovative Fashion and Cutting-Edge Technology that Defines the Lifestyle in South Korea} 3{Immerse Yourself in Gangnam's Exquisite Gastronomy, Where Food Turns into a Lifestyle Experience} 4{From Addictive K-Dramas to Groundbreaking K-Pop, Explore How the Hallyu Wave is Taking New Dimensions and Winning Hearts Worldwide} 5{Embrace the Serenity of Hanoks and Traditional Practices in a Modern World, Finding Balance in Everyday Life} 6{Explore How Sustainable Innovation and Environmental Awareness are Shaping Business Practices and Lifestyle in the Korean Capital} other{lorem ipsum}}

footer.title: Secure payment guarantee
footer.subtitle: All the data entered in the forms of our online store are stored securely encrypted under the SSL certified security protocol. In the same way, the payment system is carried out through a secure bank gateway.

derma-plan.label: Derma Plan

sun-care.description: This cream protects the skin against the sun!

toner-skin.description: These products protect to you and provides a shining face!

wrinkle-solution-toner.label: Wrinkle Solution Toner
wrinkle-solution-toner.description: These products provides to you so vitamins and antioxidants!

lotion.description: These products provides to you so some benefits!

body-care.label: Body Care
body-care.description: These products provides cleansing, exfoliating, and hair removal to nail care and body brushing!

mask-pack.label: Mask Pack
mask-pack.description: These masks are formulated with various ingredients that cater to different skincare needs, such as hydration, brightening, pore refinement, soothing, and more.!

make-up.label: Make Up
make-up.description: These products have enhancing natural features, concealing imperfections, expressing creativity, and achieving specific looks never seen before !

all-in-one.label: All in one
all-in-one.description: These products are especially popular for their convenience and time-saving properties, making them ideal for individuals looking to achieve a complete look with minimal effort or for those on the go, and achieve a flawless complexion in a single step.

perfume.label: Perfume
perfume.description: These are created through a careful blending of various aromatic ingredients, resulting in a unique and distinctive fragrance that can evoke emotions, memories, style, personal associations, and an individual's personality.

nail-care.label: Nail Care
nail-care.description: These products encompasses a range of practices and products aimed at maintaining the health, strength, and appearance of the nails.
